topSection.title: Premier Series
topSection.sub_title: Hot tubbing with a touch of elegance
topSection.top_paragraph_content: Hot tubbing with a touch of elegance - wood-wrapped siding, pillows & LED lights! Freeflow Spas hot tubs can fit almost anywhere— backyard, condo balconies, and porches.

gallerySection.text_overlay: Sport series spas are durable, energy efficient, portable & affordable.

featureSection.title: Portable Hot Tubs You’ll Love
featureSection.sub_title: Freeflow Spas hot tubs can fit almost anywhere—backyard, condo balconies, and porches. We even have a triangular spa for tight corner spaces! Plus, Freeflow spas are lightweight with most models weighing less than 350 lbs. before water, or just about the weight of a large refrigerator. The manufacturing process also makes them extremely durable, so no matter where you’re headed, you can take your hot tub with you.

bottomSection.title: Shop Other Hot Tub Collections
bottomSection.sub_title: With three different hot tub Collections there's one that fits your lifestyle.

primary_images.desc: Everything you want in a hot tub

products.name: FRESHWATER® SALT SYSTEM READY
products.desc: A revolution in worry-free water care that helps you spend more time enjoying your spa and less time maintaining it.

products.name: WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL
products.desc: Operate spa functions from anywhere in the spa and up to 30 feet away with this unique, easy-to-read color touchscreen.

products.name: MOTO-MASSAGE® DX JET
products.desc: Patented moving jets provide two powerful water streams that sweep up and down your back for a massage like no other.

products.name: SUPER ENERGY EFFICIENT AND ENERGY SMART®
products.desc: High-density, full-foam insulation is the same found in commercial freezers. With the comprehensive Energy Smart system of innovations, these are our most energy-efficient hot tubs.

products.name: 100% NO-BYPASS FILTRATION AND TRI-X®
products.desc: All the water is filtered all the time and dishwasher-safe Tri-X filters help keep water crystal clear.

products.name: POLYMER STRUCTURE AND BASE PAN
products.desc: Built for durability and long life with a structure that will never rust or rot.
